name: part_008
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕LIVE2023】3rd Generation Girls Band !!!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [AqEqeiqskEI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: 3rd Generation girls band performance of 'Tentai Kansoku'.
MC segment after the first song performance.
Video interlude featuring YAGOO (Tanigo Motoaki) praising the members.
3rd Generation girls band performance of 'Chiisana Koi no Uta' in swimsuits.

subtitles.original: 天体観測
subtitles.english: Stargazing

subtitles.original: ...ほうき星を待っている
subtitles.english: ...waiting for a comet

subtitles.original: 望遠鏡を覗き込んだ
subtitles.english: I looked through my telescope

subtitles.original: 静寂を切り裂いて いくつも声が生まれたよ
subtitles.english: Tearing through the silence, many voices were born

subtitles.original: 明日が僕らを呼んだって 返事もろくにしなかった
subtitles.english: Even if tomorrow called us, we didn't even answer

subtitles.original: 今というほうき星 君と二人追いかけていた
subtitles.english: That comet called "now", I was chasing it with you

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, ah...
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, ah...

subtitles.original: 気がつけばいつだって ひたすら何か探している
subtitles.english: I realized I'm always searching for something

subtitles.original: 幸せの定義とか 悲しみの置き場とか
subtitles.english: The definition of happiness, or a place for sadness

subtitles.original: 生まれたら死ぬまで ずっと探してるさ
subtitles.english: From birth to death, I'll be searching forever

subtitles.original: 始めようか天体観測 ほうき星をさがして
subtitles.english: Let's start our stargazing, searching for a comet

subtitles.original: 今まで見つけたものは 全部覚えている
subtitles.english: I remember everything I've found so far

subtitles.original: 君の震える手を 握れなかった痛みも
subtitles.english: Even the pain of not being able to hold your trembling hand

subtitles.original: 知らないものを知ろうとして 望遠鏡を覗き込んだ
subtitles.english: Trying to know the unknown, I looked through my telescope

subtitles.original: 暗闇を照らすような 微かな光探したよ
subtitles.english: I searched for a faint light that would light up the darkness

subtitles.original: そして知った痛みを 今だに僕は覚えている
subtitles.english: And the pain I learned then, I still remember it even now

subtitles.original: 今というほうき星 今も一人追いかけている
subtitles.english: That comet called "now", I'm still chasing it alone even now

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, ah...
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, ah...

subtitles.original: 背が伸びるにつれて 伝えたい事も増えてった
subtitles.english: As I grew taller, the things I wanted to say increased

subtitles.original: 宛名のない手紙も 崩れるほど重なった
subtitles.english: Even the letters without addresses piled up until they collapsed

subtitles.original: 僕は元気でいるよ 心配事も少ないよ
subtitles.english: I'm doing well, I have few worries

subtitles.original: ただ一つ今も 思い出すよ
subtitles.english: Except just one thing I still remember now

subtitles.original: 予報外れの雨に 打たれて泣き出しそうな
subtitles.english: Struck by unexpected rain, looking like you're about to cry

subtitles.original: 君の震える手を 握れなかったあの日を
subtitles.english: The day I couldn't hold your trembling hand

subtitles.original: 見えてるものを見落として 望遠鏡をまた担いで
subtitles.english: Overlooking what was visible, I shouldered my telescope again

subtitles.original: 静寂と暗闇の 帰り道を駆け抜けた
subtitles.english: I ran through the way home of silence and darkness

subtitles.original: そして知った痛みが 今だに僕を支えている
subtitles.english: And the pain I learned then is still supporting me now

subtitles.original: 今というほうき星 今も一人追いかけている
subtitles.english: That comet called "now", I'm still chasing it alone even now

subtitles.original: もう一度君に会おうとして 望遠鏡をまた担いで
subtitles.english: Trying to meet you once more, I shouldered my telescope again

subtitles.original: 前と同じ午前二時 踏切まで駆けてくよ
subtitles.english: Just like before at 2 AM, I'll run to the railroad crossing

subtitles.original: 始めようか天体観測 二分後に君が来なくとも
subtitles.english: Let's start our stargazing, even if you don't come in two minutes

subtitles.original: 今というほうき星 君と二人追いかけている
subtitles.english: That comet called "now", I'm chasing it with you

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, ah...
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, ah...

subtitles.original: ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: あつーいねー！
subtitles.english: It's hot, isn't it!

subtitles.original: あつーい！最高！
subtitles.english: It's hot! The best!

subtitles.original: 熱いと言ったらー？
subtitles.english: When we say "hot", then...?

subtitles.original: 水着ー！！
subtitles.english: Swimsuits!!

subtitles.original: こんなに立派になって...
subtitles.english: You've become so grand...

subtitles.original: やっぱり君たちは最高だよ。
subtitles.english: You guys really are the best.

subtitles.original: 小さな恋のうた
subtitles.english: A Small Love Song

subtitles.original: 広い宇宙の数ある一つ
subtitles.english: One of many in the vast universe

subtitles.original: 青い地球の広い世界で
subtitles.english: In the wide world of the blue Earth

subtitles.original: 小さな恋の思いは届く
subtitles.english: A small love's feelings reach

subtitles.original: 小さな島のあなたのもとへ
subtitles.english: To you on a small island

subtitles.original: あなたと出会い 時は流れる
subtitles.english: Meeting you, time flows

subtitles.original: 思いを込めた 手紙も増える
subtitles.english: The letters filled with my feelings increase

subtitles.original: いつの間にか二人響く
subtitles.english: Before we knew it, we both resonate

subtitles.original: 時に激しく 時に切なく
subtitles.english: Sometimes intensely, sometimes painfully

subtitles.original: 響くは遠く はるか彼方へ
subtitles.english: Resonating far, to the distant beyond

subtitles.original: 優しい歌は 世界を変える
subtitles.english: A gentle song changes the world

subtitles.original: ほら あなたにとって大事な人ほど
subtitles.english: Look, the more important someone is to you

subtitles.original: すぐそばにいるの
subtitles.english: The closer they are to you

subtitles.original: ただ あなたにだけ届いて欲しい
subtitles.english: I just want it to reach only you

subtitles.original: 響け恋の歌
subtitles.english: Resonate, song of love

subtitles.original: ほら
subtitles.english: Look

subtitles.original: ほら
subtitles.english: Look
